name: 英語字根研究
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習◎限大二大三大四修習
goals: To expand the scope of learners' vocabulary through studying classical roots
To understand how word meanings have changed over time
To uncover the hidden and often surprising connections between words
To examine the linguistic phenomena involved in the derivation of words
syllabus:
**Course description**

As more than 70 percent of the total vocabulary of English is borrowed, “the more we know about the sources and processes of linguistic borrowing, the better our chances of coping with technical vocabulary and general usage” (Stockwell & Minkova 2001). In this course, students will expand their vocabulary through a conscientious study of Latin and Greek roots in English (incl. associated terms covered in the thematic focus). The course will also examine the linguistic changes accompanying word formation.

Handouts & supplementary materials will be distributed in class.
